archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Close Resource Order
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This process monitors the status of the order and changes the status to closed when it is completed.

properties.value: The objective of the Close Resource Order processes is to close a resource order when the resource provisioning activities have been completed. These processes monitor the status of all open resource orders, and recognize that a resource order is ready to be closed when the status is changed to completed.
